item.description:
Join us for yet another Nerd Fun snob solidarity endeavor, in the heart of intellectual razzmatazz, Harvard Sq. Be there or be Sq.

Appropriatly we meet at Grendels Den, which has  a glorious half price food menu, (with the purchase of a $3.50 drink) but get your order in early, we'll be settling the tab around 7 PM.

The premise is that everyone wants to sound clever. Here's your chance without appearing to be pretentious.

You don't have to be a genuine snob to join. Pseudo-intellectuals are also welcome. All you need is an aloof attitude full of irony and some baffling intellectual or pseudo-intellectual ideas; or--dare I say it--unanswered questions you wish to convey incognito. HUMOR in good taste: ALLOWED.

Skepticism is the favorite theme of Intellectual Snobs because we love to doubt everything.

Snobs are pretty clueless about TRIVIA --Say, ex., who hit the most home runs in what year, (fiddle-faddle!) --but we like to  shock & confound each other w/ other stuff--

Example, --If people are solid, how can they be X-rayed? Or: the supposed contribution of cows to global warming; --re/ "lobsters can't feel pain," if so, how can they survive in the wild? ...or: in the cities, is pollen what really causes allergies? Can't humans be feral and lions domesticated? (If so what kind of world would that be?)

The idea is to write your baffling or conspiratorial snob idea or question on a name tag (provided) and attach such tag to your shirt, OR chuck such idea or question in a basket which will be provided and passed around (please pass it around!) Once this deed is done, fellow snobs may pluck from the basket & discuss.

Intellectual apparel is allowed. Startle the waitstaff with a fake mustache, goatee, periwig, or monocle: ALLOWED. No Meerschaum tabacco pipes please. Absinthe is not served.

Take heed, do not attempt to be late. Service quality diminishes after 5:30. Grab the seats while the waitstaff are waiterly. Be patient, these seats are first come first serve.

Like a genuine snob, try to get your order in when others do. Please bring cash. Separate tabs are not encouraged.

When settling the tab, make sure and add 25% of what you are spending for tax and tip!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be hovering around one of the three big tables in one of the three corners.
item.name: Intellectual Snob TRIVIA Ed. --Skepticism
